r.s: APM and distributed tracing for PHP
r.d: The Datadog PHP Tracer brings APM and distributed tracing to PHP.
r.n:
## All products ### Fixed - Checks for more ioncube extension names in SSI loader #3204
## Tracer ### Fixed - Fix crash due to double close of span #3202
## Profiling ### Fixed - Disable allocation profiling when JIT is enabled on PHP 8.4 #3199
